official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 for fiscal years 1989 and 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 to extend the Department of the Interior's authorization of appropriations for such Act through FY 1990.
